dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold bets and invest aggressively, seeking high returns with moderate risk.
Your FarTwin will play it safe, preferring stable investments with lower potential for growth.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully analyze data and facts to make informed decisions, weighing pros and cons meticulously.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on gut feelings to guide decision-making, often taking a more spontaneous approach.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage emotions in public?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express their feelings openly and honestly, using emotional language to convey thoughts and opinions.
Your FarTwin will maintain a more reserved demeanor, carefully choosing words and tone to avoid revealing strong emotions.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with new people?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and friendly, actively seeking to meet new people and build connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller social circles and may take time to warm up to new individuals, valuing one-on-one interactions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through practical experiences, experimenting and taking hands-on approaches to understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will focus on theoretical frameworks and abstract ideas, preferring a more cerebral approach to learning.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adhere to strict schedules and deadlines, prioritizing timeliness and efficiency.
Your FarTwin will be more relaxed about time constraints, preferring to adapt to changing circumstances and adjust their pace accordingly.

dimensions.label: Risk in Online Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate online discourse?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in direct and assertive online interactions, standing firm on their opinions and not backing down from debate.
Your FarTwin will take a more cautious approach online, avoiding confrontations and focusing on maintaining a positive reputation.

dimensions.label: Prioritization of Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin set priorities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on high-priority goals, driving themselves to achieve ambitious targets and push boundaries.
Your FarTwin will prioritize practical considerations, weighing short-term gains against long-term benefits before making decisions.
